member.name: F:Discord.Modules.ModuleFilter.None
member.summary: Disables the event and command filters.

member.name: F:Discord.Modules.ModuleFilter.ServerWhitelist
member.summary: Uses the server whitelist to filter events and commands.

member.name: F:Discord.Modules.ModuleFilter.ChannelWhitelist
member.summary: Uses the channel whitelist to filter events and commands.

member.name: F:Discord.Modules.ModuleFilter.AlwaysAllowPrivate
member.summary: Enables this module in all private messages.
